iana.template_text:
(last updated 2007-08-14)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.antix.game-component

Required parameters : None

Optional parameters : None

Encoding considerations : binary
This media type may require encoding on transports not capable of handling binary.

Security considerations :
The archive is cryptographically signed to ensure that the archive's
content has not been modified since it was published and signed,
and therefore to allow the user to make an informed decision about
whether to allow the content to execute, based on their level of
trust in the content publisher. This format is not intended to provide
security for confidential information - the archive is not encrypted,
and so confidential information should not be included within the file.


Interoperability considerations :
This content type is solely intended for use with Antix Game Player, and is not
intended to be interoperable with any other system.

Published specification :
The specification for this content type is not public, but is available from
Antix Labs Ltd as part of the documentation within the Antix Game Player ADK.


Applications which use this media :
Antix Game Player by Antix Labs Ltd.


Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : None
2. File extension(s) : .atx
3. Macintosh file type code : None
4. Object Identifiers: None

None

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Daniel Shelton
2. Email : daniel.shelton&antixlabs.com

Intended usage : Common
A cryptographically signed distribution format for Antix Game Components.

Author/Change controller : Daniel Shelton,
Antix Labs Ltd,

Earley,
